page.title: 11INTERVIEW WITH AN O.A.P.
page.content: {The pensioner has lived in this area {for 75 years.}Both his and his wife's fathers were miners. He had been a miner at{Tirpentwys mine}until it closed in{October, 1970.}The miners at Tirpentwys were given redundency money, or were transferred to other pits in the area. {The pensioner has witnessed many {changes over the years - most of them {bad. He is troubled by the decline of the traditional industries in the area; {"There will be nothing left for the {youngsters" he says. Both he and his wife feel isolat- ed.Because of poor transport their social life is non-existent and they are unable to walk to Pontnewynydd because of ill-health. {He said "We are being forgotten"
